-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET = ET
local ET
System.import(function (out)
  ET = out.ET
end)
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("EnterMapFinish_RemoveLobbyUI", function (namespace)
    local Run
    Run = function (this, args)
      return System.async(function (async, this, args)
        -- 加载场景资源
        ET.ResourcesComponent.Instance:LoadBundle("map.unity3d")
        -- 切换到map场景
        System.using(ET.Game.getScene():AddComponent2(ET.SceneChangeComponent), function (sceneChangeComponent)
          async:Await(ET.SceneChangeComponentSystem.ChangeSceneAsync(sceneChangeComponent, "Map"))
        end)
        args.ZoneScene:AddComponent2(ET.OperaComponent)
        async:Await(ET.UIHelper.Remove(args.ZoneScene, "UILobby" --[[UIType.UILobby]]))
      end, nil, this, args)
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.AEvent_1(out.ET.EventType.EnterMapFinish)
        }
      end,
      Run = Run
    }
  end)
end)
